SEO.title: Industry Info, News & Tips
SEO.description: Check our blog for the latest updates and news from the world of blockchain, AI, VR, IoT, software and app development.

data.title: How to Choose the Best Ethereum Wallet
data.baseline: Ethereum wallets allow users to easily and smoothly interact with the Ethereum network. Since there’s a wealth of Ether wallets to choose from it would be easy to get lost, but it’s important to sift through them all to find the one that will suit your personal needs and requirements.

data.title: Ethereum Smart Contracts: What Are They and How to Deploy Them With Solidity
data.baseline: Back in 2015, when Ethereum was initially released, blockchain technology was no longer new to the world, but it was the successful implementation of smart contracts that put this blockchain platform ahead of the game.

preview320.title: communicate-with-exchanges-using-cryptogateway-main-1600
preview320.alt: People developing an API next to a bitcoin physical coin

data.title: How We Bind Data From Exchanges to Build Efficient Trading Applications
data.baseline: High performance and result-driven strategies are a must-have in trading as you need to quickly respond to rapid crypto price fluctuations. We support our trading applications with a CryptoGateway application shell that provides instant access to market data from various exchanges in a uniform manner.

data.title: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs): A Booming Trend From the Blockchain World
data.baseline: Blockchain never ceases to bombard us with mind-blowing innovations and hot trends. Right now, it’s non-fungible tokens that have become the real attention-grabbers and game-changers globally, and they’re likely to continue amazing us even further.

preview320.title: public-vs-private-blockchain-main-1600
preview320.alt: People illustrating the comparison of private and public blockchain paradigms

data.title: Public vs. Private Blockchain: How Different Are They?
data.baseline: Blockchain technology has taken the world by storm over the last few years. It has given businesses a new way of handling data and doing so securely. There is no doubt that in the next decade we will see blockchain continue to impact business operations.

preview320.alt: Two people harvesting bitcoin tokens in the field

data.title: What Is Yield Farming and Why Is It So Popular?
data.baseline: Yield farming is the emerging trend in the crypto world that has grabbed the attention of a number of cryptocurrency enthusiasts. It looks very promising and is now considered one of the most popular ways of generating rewards with cryptocurrency holdings.

preview320.alt: Two people operating tablets next to a building and tokens

data.title: Real Estate Tokenization: What Is It and What Benefits Does It Offer?
data.baseline: Wherever you turn — blockchain is everywhere. The technology has penetrated even the dauntingly complex world of real estate. It has introduced the industry to tokenization, bringing the potential for greater transparency, liquidity, and inclusiveness.

preview320.title: blockchain-tokenization-commodities-main-1600
preview320.alt: Two people tokenizing gold on a conveyor

data.title: Asset Tokenization: Digitized Commodities as a New Investment Opportunity
data.baseline: Tokenization of real-world assets gives investors a chance to securely trade the whole or a fraction of the commodities they own. At the same time, asset-backed cryptocurrency mitigates volatility and offers a stable and trustworthy investment opportunity.
